text: Sadiq Jaber (born 20 August 1960) is an Iraqi former football goalkeeper who played for Iraq at the 1982 Asian Games. Jaber played for Iraq in 1982.http://niiiis.com/players2.html ==References== Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraq international footballers Category:Living people Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Al-Shorta SC players Category:Footballers at the 1982 Asian Games Category:1960 births
title: Sadiq Jaber
